headline: House Opens Inquiry on Asylum Policy
abstract: The House Judiciary Committee asked the Department of Homeland Security for documents, data and communications on the “Remain in Mexico” asylum policy.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The House Judiciary Committee opened an investigation on Tuesday into a Trump administration policy that sends many asylum seekers to Mexico to wait for their court hearings, and Democrats demanded documents, data and communications by the end of the month.
keywords: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
